summary: This allows Spells to be made at forges using ruined books and ale.
descriptionHtml:
This allows Spells to be made at forges using ruined books and ale.

The back story is that a wizard found out that ale has a magical property that restores books when trying to make books that you can eat .

The way to do this is to go to a forge and the spell tomes are in the misc.


Install (Simple):
You can use the Nexus Mod manager which i highly recommend for most mods as it is simple to use.

updates:
1.0- All vanilla spell Tomes added

0.3 - More Spell Tomes (New tomes are from the letter D on wards )

0.2 - can now make 5 ruined books using firewood ( I will change to linen wraps later and you need a tanning rack ). added more tomes.

Uninstall: Use NMM or delete the SpellTomesAtForges.esp

comment if i missed any spell tomes or comment just to comment
author: rocket365
